Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 nights staff brilliant breakfast excellent am disabled limited walking using walking stick 2 steps lift lift didnt roof garden breakfast lift ground floor climb lot stairs choice sitting downstairs own deal effort husband helped climb stairs suitable wheelchair location helpful friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Below Average Rooms, otherwise just OK”
Reviews.Author: soormay
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights feb vacation rome probably expensive hotel stayed cities trip venice florence location pretty decent entrance decent impression look glass bar left enter hotel reception upgraded contemporary furniture check ok staff neither happy rude didnt warm reception entrance odd tiny computer internet pay followed alley steps alley horrible smell coming connected dumpster below plastic sheet elevator fit max luggage 5th top 7 steps reach hallway flight steps 2 floor barely fitting double bed walking space locker found key reception sign needless reception tell checking required trip alley bathroom ok tiny shower barely person iron provided manager available laundry service option breakfast decent bored 3 days warm food expresso machine breakfast stay bfast pretty nice furniture regular restaurant day overall location breakfast rest average below average
